verbose_text: Isoform specific RT-PCR in brain and liver of three mammalian species -human, rat and mouse- demonstrates co-expression of two GLS2 transcript variants showing alternative first exons (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG) : a long GAB transcript, previously cloned from ZR-75 breast cancer cells XREF_BIBR, and a short LGA transcript, lacking the first exon of GAB, and first characterized in rat liver XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
